content.title: Safe, enjoyable holidays – take a look at our holiday ideas

content.textLeft:
Be inspired by our ideas for your holiday in a holiday home and find the perfect villa, chalet or apartment for your stay: enjoy a holiday without compromise, with more space and freedom than a hotel.

Interhome holiday accommodation meets all your individual wishes and needs. You can choose from a spacious holiday home with pool, a villa by the sea, a cosy chalet in the mountains, a detached holiday home as an ideal retreat in the countryside or a holiday apartment directly in the city centre.

Here you will certainly find the right inspiration for your next holiday.
content.textRight:
That is why a holiday in a holiday home or apartment is the right choice for you:

Holidays in a holiday home stand for freedom and independence, beginning with your individual arrival in your own car.

Be your own boss and enjoy your privacy, undisturbed.

You don’t have to share your accommodation and have the option to cater for yourself.

Design your own holiday without missing all the comfort, quality and security of home.

Relax on your holiday: you are in good hands. Make the most of personal assistance and a safe, yet hassle-free, hand-over of the key.

>> That's how safe you are in your holiday home! Find out more here

content.title: Holiday in your own country – instant relaxation

content.text:
A short, straightforward journey as well as a familiar language and currency: You will have even more time and an increased holiday budget to really enjoy your holiday in the United Kingdom. It is also good to escape everyday life for just a few days, with Interhome short breaks are possible. It's also worth taking a look at our last minute offers, or, if you are planning a longer stay, at holiday accommodation with an early booking discount. 

So why not get away from everyday life and explore the most beautiful regions of your own country in a holiday home or apartment!

elements.title: Why choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than doing it than in a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, experience the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or indulge yourself in the luxury of a Spanish Villa. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online with us - it is quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: A stay in a holiday house or apartment offers so many advantages: spend your time exactly the way you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules and pace. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Kick back and enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your own holiday letting.
